name: value-store
description: Get/set values on hierarchy of objects
author: Eli Doran <eli+npm@elidoran.com>

scripts.test-all: npm run test4 && npm run test6 && npm run test7
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover -x 'benchmark/**' -x 'build/**' -x 'docs/**' -x 'examples/**' _mocha -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require build/coverage.js -R spec test/lib
scripts.coverage-lcov: istanbul cover -x 'benchmark/**' -x 'build/**' -x 'docs/**' -x 'examples/**' _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require build/coverage.js -R spec test/lib
